generalQuestions.question: Which social media platforms do you use regularly?
Why do you use social media? Check all that apply.

answers.disp: to keep in touch with friends and family
to share stuff with friends and family
to record my life and keep memories
to learn about or talk about cool stuff
to get help or feel supported
to be a part of a community
to promote my work / to network

addictionQuestions.question: How often do you check social media?

answers.disp: about once per week or less

addictionQuestions.question: Do you impulsively check social media? (such as at work, in class, when waking up, when you get home...)
Do you use social media when you know you should be doing other things?

answers.disp: yes, this is a familiar feeling

addictionQuestions.question: Do you use social media to distract yourself from problems you're dealing with in real life?

answers.disp: no, but it does help me chill sometimes

addictionQuestions.question: In the past, have you tried to cut back on social media use and failed?

answers.disp: no, I haven't tried to cut back
no, I cut back pretty successfully
I cut back, but not as much as I had hoped
yes, now I tell myself that it's ok

anxietyQuestions.question: Do you feel isolated or disconnected from other people?
Do you feel that you're "falling behind" compared to your friends?
Do you care about the number of likes or interactions you receive on social media? (likes, retweets, upvotes, reblogs, etc)
When you use social media, do you worry that your friends are doing things that you're missing out on? (FOMO)
Have you used social media to portray yourself as different from how you really are?

hostilityQuestions.question: Do you have any anonymous social media accounts that you use regularly?
Do you enjoy debating with people on social media?

answers.disp: no, I really try to avoid it
no, but I do it anyway

hostilityQuestions.question: Whenever you see someone say something dumb or rude on the internet, how often do you try to correct them?
When replying to someone rude or provocative, what is usually the tone of your response?

answers.disp: I try to be as polite as possible
I try to be straightforward and objective
I try to be witty and dish it back at them

misinformationQuestions.question: Do you get most of your news of current events from social media feeds?
Of all the sources (people, pages, organizations, communities, etc) that deliver your political or world news, which do you read the most from?

answers.disp: sources that mostly align with my views
sources that most people would agree are "neutral"
sources that mostly disagree with my views

misinformationQuestions.question: How often do you read news and opinions from sources that have biases opposing your political beliefs?
Of all of the people that you follow on various social media sites, how many of them hold views opposing your political beliefs?
